title: Default Reset Time
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When the default reset time is set
and the user backgrounds the app

custom_steps_separated.content: for less than 6 hours
custom_steps_separated.expected: when they foreground the app, the user should be left on the same view

custom_steps_separated.content: for 6 or more hours
custom_steps_separated.expected: when they foreground the app, the user should be reset to the default view

title: Favorite Team
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user has a Favorite Team
and no Default View set (in Settings)
and the user backgrounds the app on another view
and the background time is 6 hours
custom_expected: Then the user should be taken to the Team Page

title: No Favorite Team
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user does not have a Favorite Team
and no Default View set (in Settings)
and the user backgrounds the app on another view
and the background time is 6 hours
custom_expected: Then the user should be taken to the Scoreboard

title: Default View Set
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user has a Favorite Team
and the user backgrounds the app on another view
and the background time is 6 hours

custom_steps_separated.content: and Default view in Settings is set to Favorite Team
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user should be taken to the Team Page

custom_steps_separated.content: and Default view in Settings is set to Scores
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user should be taken to the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: and Default view in Settings is set to News
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user should be taken to the News

title: Team Page
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed

and the background time is 6 hours

custom_steps_separated.content:
and no Default view set
and the user has a Favorite Team
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user should be taken to the Favorite Team when the app is foregrounded

custom_steps_separated.content:

custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user should be taken to the Scoreboard when the app is foregrounded

custom_steps_separated.content:

custom_steps_separated.content:
and Default view set to Scores
and the user has Favorite Team
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user should be taken to the Scores when the app is foregrounded

custom_steps_separated.content:
and Default view set to News
and the user has Favorite Team
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user should be taken to the News when the app is foregrounded

title: Default View Set -> Set to Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
* App installed
* Favorite Team is set
* User has backgrounded app 6 or more hours
custom_steps: Given user has Favorite Team has been set in settings
custom_expected: Then the user should be taken to the Team Page

title: Default View Set -> Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
* App installed
* Favorite Team is set
* User has backgrounded app 6 or more hours
custom_steps: Given Default view in Settings is set to Scores
custom_expected: Then the user should be taken to the Scoreboard

title: Default View Set -> News
custom_preconds:
* App installed
* Favorite Team is set
* User has backgrounded app 6 or more hours
custom_steps: Given Default view in Settings is set to News
custom_expected: Then the user should be taken to the News
